a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}30-DINGIR-a.a lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-a ina UGU {URU}ma-ha-zi-MEŠ ša MAN be-li₂ ip-qi-da-an-ni ma-a a-bal-la-tuk-ka a-bal-la-tuk-ka mi-mi-ni la ep-pu-šu₂ šum-ma {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN et-ti-iq a-bal-duk-ka a-bal-duk-ka la et-ti-qu u šum-ma {LU₂}ha-za-na-ti x x+x x+x x x x+x x x x x x it-x+x x x x x x ṭe₃-e-mu x x x x is-se-niš ina bi UM a-ha-meš šu-nu-ma a-ha-meš u₂-gal₃-lu-du
